info.title: Swagger Petstore
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

formDataParameterSubSchema.description: Additional data to pass to server
formDataParameterSubSchema.name: additionalMetadata

bodyParameter.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
bodyParameter.name: body

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store

bodyParameter.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
bodyParameter.name: body

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

queryParameterSubSchema.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter
queryParameterSubSchema.name: status

get.description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.

post.summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data

pathParameterSubSchema.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated
pathParameterSubSchema.name: petId

get.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities

post.summary: Place an order for a pet

bodyParameter.description: order placed for purchasing the pet
bodyParameter.name: body

get.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10. Other values will generated exceptions

pathParameterSubSchema.description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched
pathParameterSubSchema.name: orderId

delete.description: For valid response try integer IDs with positive integer value. Negative or non-integer values will generate API errors

pathParameterSubSchema.description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted
pathParameterSubSchema.name: orderId

post.summary: Creates list of users with given input array

pathParameterSubSchema.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.
pathParameterSubSchema.name: username

put.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

pathParameterSubSchema.description: name that need to be updated
pathParameterSubSchema.name: username

delete.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

pathParameterSubSchema.description: The name that needs to be deleted
pathParameterSubSchema.name: username

queryParameterSubSchema.description: The password for login in clear text
queryParameterSubSchema.name: password

value.description: date in UTC when token expires
calls per hour allowed by the user

get.summary: Logs out current logged in user session

post.summary: Creates list of users with given input array

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about our store
